summary: Contoso Wireless offers streaming services that allow customers to access movies, TV shows, live sports events, news broadcasts, and music videos. Customers can choose from three different plans that provide access to up to 5, 10, or 15 devices, up to 20, 50, or 100 hours of streaming time per month, and unlimited access to Contoso Wireless' library of content. The service also offers parental controls and an offline viewing feature. Customers can sign up for the service by visiting the website and selecting the plan that best suits their needs.
